segments.text: Slow down ! You can't exceed the speed limits .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I cann't . I'm in a hurry !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you can not . It is dangerous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shut up ! Now you are in my car , you should listen to me . Or you can get off . I've told you I'm in a hurry . I don't want to waste time on the road .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . You shouldn't drive like that .
segments.speaker: S1
